name: Hapicite-E 20 mg tablet
description: Escitalopram is an SSRI (selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor) antidepressant medicine used to treat depression as well as generalized anxiety disorders, which cause prolonged and extreme worry regarding everyday events and situations. It functions by boosting the amount of serotonin in your brain, which aids in mental balance. It may boost your energy, make you feel better, and reduce your nervousness.
label: medicine
